resentments.the_cause: They criticized my work in front of others and made me look incompetent

my_part.description: I was selfish because I only cared about how I looked. I was self-seeking because I wanted recognition and praise. I was frightened of being seen as incompetent or losing my position.

realizations.insight: My ego and pride were hurt more than any actual damage to my career. The criticism may have been valid and intended to help me improve.
I often seek external validation for my self-worth, which makes me vulnerable to others' opinions.

actions_taken.action: Prayed for this person to have everything I want for myself
actions_taken.outcome: Felt some relief and shift in perspective

prayer_status.prayer_notes: Using the resentment prayer from page 552 of the Big Book

resentments.notes: This resentment shows my pattern of ego-driven reactions and fear of judgment. Need to work on finding self-worth from within and my Higher Power, not from others' opinions.
